title: Trade in enslaved people map - effect

content.question: A significant long-term result of the major pattern depicted on the map was

choices.label: frequent intermarriage between people of African and British descent
an increase in the destructiveness of American Indian warfare
the development of a strict racial system in British colonial societies
cooperation between European countries over colonization in the Americas

content.answer: the development of a strict racial system in British colonial societies

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
